news.title: Biig Biig and Jelani Blackman join KNEECAP demonstration at Westminster Magistrates' Court
news.summary: Additional names are expected to be announced in the lead-up to the event.

news.title: Blondie episode of Hot Press Classics out now
news.summary: Paul Nolan and Stuart Clark are gonna get ya one way or another, as they revisit Blondie’s 1978 classic Parallel Lines.

news.title: Irish sport figures call for Central Band of Ireland "to stop facilitating Israel’s genocide bonds"
news.summary: “‘Irish Sport should not be associated with genocide” says the Ireland-Palestine Solidarity Campaign.

news.title: New David Bowie I Can't Give Everything Away (2002-2016) box set to be released in September
news.summary: A new box set featuring David Bowie's work from 2002-2016 has been announced.

news.title: United Against Racism responds to Co. Tyrone bonfire featuring migrant boat
news.summary: The boat, erected on top of the bonfire in Moygashel, contains a dozen mannequins wearing life jackets.

news.summary: Joel Jacob looks ahead to Seedhe Maut, Hanumankind and Peter Cat Recording Co.'s Dublin shows...
